querystring.select: SELECT AC.CUST_NAME AS CustName, RCM.CUST_MODEL_NAME AS CustModelName, ACC.COMPANY_BRAND_NAME AS CompanyBrandName, RIT.INDUSTRY_TYPE_NAME AS IndustryTypeName, RCT.DESCR AS CompanyTypeName, ACC.NUM_OF_EMP AS NumOfEmp, AC.TAX_ID_NO AS TaxIdNo, ACC.IS_AFFILIATED AS IsAffiliated, ACC.ESTABLISHMENT_DT AS EstablishmentDt, AC.IS_VIP AS IsVip
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_COMPANY ACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID = ACC.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_CUST_MODEL RCM WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.CUST_MODEL_CODE = RCM.CUST_MODEL_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_INDUSTRY_TYPE RIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.INDUSTRY_TYPE_CODE = RIT.INDUSTRY_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RCT WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.MR_COMPANY_TYPE_CODE = RCT.MASTER_CODE AND RCT.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'COMPANY_TYPE'
